name: Behead|Cleave
script:
cecho("<blue>

Behead / Cleave! BEHEAD / CLEAVE!
Behead / Cleave! BEHEAD / CLEAVE!
Behead / Cleave! BEHEAD / CLEAVE!

")
matches: ^[A-Z][a-z]+ raises (his|her) .+ over (his|her) head and begins to swing it in a wide circle, gaining speed as s?he goes\.$
^([A-Z][a-z]+) raises an? .+ over you to pass judgement on your sins, and it begins to crackle with righteous fire\.$
^[A-Z][a-z]+ moves into the deeply mournful yet glorious tones of a funeral mass, directing the performance\.$
^[A-Z][a-z]+ masterfully adds heavier, darker tones to h(?:is|er) song, which rises and falls with a melancholy rhythm\.$
^[A-Z][a-z]+ begins to bear down on you with h(?:is|er) .+\.$
